dta.DynameqScenario¶

class DynameqScenario(startTime=Time(0, 0), endTime=Time(23, 0))¶

Bases: dta.Scenario.Scenario

A Dynameq Scenario.

Constructor of a Scenario for Dynameq.

Parameters:
  • startTime (a dta.Time instance) – the start time of the scenario.
  • endTime (a dta.Time instance) – the end time of the scenario.
__init__(startTime=Time(0, 0), endTime=Time(23, 0))¶

Constructor of a Scenario for Dynameq.

Parameters:
  • startTime (a dta.Time instance) – the start time of the scenario.
  • endTime (a dta.Time instance) – the end time of the scenario.
